RelatedSentence: Abayomi Azikiwe is the editor of Pan-African News Wire , an international electronic press service designed to foster intelligent discussion on the affairs of African people throughout the continent and the world .

RelatedSentence: The press agency was founded in January of 1998 and has published thousands of articles and dispatches in newspapers , magazines , journals , research reports , blogs and websites throughout the world .
